short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SHINee Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD SHINee background. SHINee wallpaper background theme for K-pop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a new SHINee wallpaper with every tab you open.
2. Customize your SHINee background by randomizing or selecting your favorite in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Includes a note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Provides shortcuts to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Add shortcuts to the panel for rapid website access.
10. Direct links to Google apps.
11. Easy navigation to additional themes.
12. Streamlined social media sharing.
13. Instant access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to gaming sites.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your SHINee new tab.
